mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `title`, `is_public`, `difficulty`, `create_time` FROM `program_problem_bank` WHERE `author_id` = #{authorId} ORDER BY `id` DESC

SELECT b.`id`, b.`title`, b.`is_public`, b.`difficulty`, b.`create_time`, b.`author_id`, a.`nick_name` AS `authorName` FROM `program_problem_bank` b, `basic_admin` a WHERE b.`author_type` = 1 AND b.`author_id` = a.`id` ORDER BY `id` DESC
